Strike Terror.name: Strike Terror
Strike Terror.flavor: You attack with a bloodcurdling cry. Your enemy gives ground in fear.
Strike Terror.attack: Strength vs. Reflex or Dexterity vs. Reflex
Strike Terror.onHit: 2[W] + Strength or Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares.

Nerves of Steel.name: Nerves of Steel
Nerves of Steel.flavor: You are irrepressible. When others would fold up, you shake off your despair and fear.
Nerves of Steel.effect: Make a saving throw against a condition affecting you that a save can end. If it is a fear effect, you gain a +5 power bonus to the saving throw.

Keelhaul.name: Keelhaul
Keelhaul.flavor: You staple your foe with your weapon and drag the creature behind you as you bull your way across the battlefield.
Keelhaul.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift 3 squares while pulling the target 3 squares. The target must remain adjacent to you.
Keelhaul.onMiss: Half damage, and you do not shift, nor do you pull the target.
